description.en: One of the first ever experimental DeFi tokens utilizing the low fees on a growing Polygon Network. We're convinced that Polygon is the next up and coming Blockchain Platform, and wanted to take advantage of that. We're currently in development of our own PolyStar Arcade Gaming Platform, where users will need to burn a small amount of tokens to play, and the Top Tier will get awesome rewards paid in PolyStar! Furthermore, we want to make NFTs in every Zodiac sign for our token holders, and by that giving them an identity, and also a team - for further PolyStar Battles!
